content: A random thought: opt (release) builds are non-incremental by default, right? So are the incr-full, incr-unchanged, and incr-patched scenarios non-interesting for opt builds?

We force incremental on in perf - and it's "in theory" relevant for folks who do the same. rustc for example has incremental forced on, and iirc some folks blanket enable it even for release compilation (I think I do, though not in rustc)
